channel.title: CTF on Cyberrzzerk
channel.description: Recent content in CTF on Cyberrzzerk

item.title: 404 CTF 2024 - Artificial intelligence serie - AI
item.description: List of Challenges Du poison [1/2] Du poison [2/2] Du poison [3/2] Des portes dérobées Du poison [1/2] - Introduction Reminder of the Statement Lors de votre dernière compétition de voile, vous avez regardé les hélicoptères passer au-dessus de vous pour commenter la compétition. Qu’est-ce qu’ils sont agaçants ! À critiquer tous les participants alors qu’ils ne sont même pas sur l’eau… Vous décidez de vous amuser un peu. Ils utilisent une intelligence artificielle pour détecter les voiliers, c’est bien ça ?

item.title: FCSC 2024 - Fifty Shades of White - Reverse
item.description: Introduction You are now Jesse Pinkman. You’re currently on the outs with Walter White and want to do something nasty to him. You are asked to write a keygen for the binary that Walter has designed to restrict access to his “professional” data. The flag will appear after 50 successive validations. We are provided with a binary and a txt file. The chall remote then asks us to validate 50 users, so we’ll need to find a way to reverse validate() correctly in order to generate a valid serial for each user.

item.title: FCSC 2024 - Horreur, Malheur serie - Forensic
item.description: Introduction You’ve just been hired as Information Systems Security Manager (ISSM) for a strategic company. When you arrive at your office on your first day, you realise that your predecessor has left you a USB stick with a note on it: VPN compromised (integrity). Version 22.3R1 b1647. Note: The first part (Encrypted Archive) unlocks the other parts, with the exception of the second part (Initial Access) which can be processed independently.

item.title: FCSC 2024 - Illuminated - Misc
item.description: Introduction A lighting designer challenges you to reconstruct a video screen animation stored on her DMX recorder. You then take a network capture (capture.pcap) by connecting to her recorder via Ethernet. To help you, she gives you an annotated extract from the documentation for her video screen (cheatsheet.pdf). cheatsheet.pdf: capture.pcap: Following the instructions and the PDF cheat sheet, I retrieve each LED and display it using a Python program. from scapy.

item.title: FCSC 2024 - Prison break serie - Misc
item.description: Introduction Carlos, obviously innocent, is locked up in a high-security prison. The prison’s building management system (BMS) is controlled by a programmable logic controller (PLC). Access to this PLC was made possible by an implant concealed during a previous operation, which can be accessed from outside the prison via (UDP protocol): nc -u prison-break.france-cybersecurity-challenge.fr 47808 Similarly, read-only access to the scada supervision interface is possible from : https://prison-break.france-cybersecurity-challenge.fr/ To help Carlos escape, follow the instructions for the following checkpoints carefully:

item.title: FCSC 2024 - Silence - Forensic
item.description: Introduction You’re Bob. An old friend sent you a flag for a future FCSC a few years ago, before you lost touch. She reminds you that she is now part of the FCSC organisation. She has been able to set up this flag and offers to play it for you. The problem is that the flag has been left in an SMS backup in your SMS application of the time, Silence.

item.title: Disparue(s) CTF - Oscarzulu - OSINT
RITSEC CTF 2023 - Full
item.description: redonne moi cette page markdown mais quand il y a du texte traduit en anglais: info : https://ctftime.org/event/1860 Challenge completed Crypto Either or Neither nor A Fine Cipher Misc New Hire Wild Stocks Connection Terminated Forensics Red Team Activity 1 Red Team Activity 2 Red Team Activity 3 Red Team Activity 4 Steganography Weird turtle QR Web Echoes Rick Roll Pickle Store X-Men Lore Broken Bot Reversing Cats At Play Guess the Password Chandi Bot Chandi bot 1 Chandi bot 2 Chandi bot 3 Chandi bot 4 Chandi bot 5 Chandi bot 6 Write-ups Crypto Either or Neither nor The flag format is “MetaCTF{*}”.
